location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Thomas H. Sheridan, Acting Public Secretary at Tauris to Lieut. William Bruce, Esquire, Acting Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Thomas H. Sheridan, Acting Public Secretary at Tauris [Tabriz, Iran] to Lieut. William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire, enclosing a packet by Sir Harford Jones to be safely sent to the Governor in Council at Bombay.
